## DOMProxy.has() method

Get weak reference to `beforeShadow` or `afterShadow` node

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(type: 'beforeShadow' | 'afterShadow'): ShadowRoot | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | 'beforeShadow' \| 'afterShadow' |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
